meanings.definition: A wild goat with long, ridged horns.
meanings.sent1: The ibex gracefully climbed the rocky mountain.
meanings.sent2: I saw an ibex in the zoo with impressive horns.
meanings.sent3: The ibex decided to have a horn-growing contest with the mountain goats.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the ibex's horns.
meanings.sent5: The ibex's horns looked like a crown atop its head.

meanings.definition: The flesh of the ibex, used as food.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious stew using ibex meat.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, ibex is considered a delicacy.
meanings.sent3: The ibex meat was so tender, it practically melted in your mouth.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the cooking ibex filled the entire village.
meanings.sent5: The ibex meat was so flavorful, it left everyone wanting more.

meanings.definition: To hunt or pursue ibex for sport or food.
meanings.sent1: We decided to ibex hunt in the mountains for our camping trip.
meanings.sent2: The villagers would often ibex hunt during the winter months.
meanings.sent3: He tried to ibex hunt, but the ibex outsmarted him every time.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was constantly ibex hunting for the perfect job.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of ibex hunting kept them coming back for more adventures.
